help.overview: This plugin allows admins to control the bot.
help.command:
Changes the bot's nick.
Usage: nick newnick

Causes the bot to quit irc.
Usage: quit [quit message]

Causes the bot to join a channel.
Usage: join channelname

Causes the bot to part a channel.
Usage: part channelname

Causes the bot to cycle (part and rejoin) a channel.
Usage: cycle channelname

Causes the bot to say something to the specified channel.
Usage: say channelname text

Causes the bot to send a message to the specified nickname.
Usage: msg nickname text

Causes the bot to op you in a given channel if you are both a user and a valid op for that channel.
Usage: op channelname
